Description: "TOC" doesn't work properly when previewed in viewer.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Set TOC on table group header, detail, group footer.
2. Preview in html viewer.
3. It isn't displayed properly. See attached screen shot.
It works in my build, assign to Jun for recheck.

Am I missing something? This report can not be run.
